v. 给（尤指衣服或容器）安衬里；铺，垫（某物内部）；沿（某物边）排列成行（line 的现在分词）

sentences.en: The drugs were secreted in the lining of his case.
sentences.cn: 毒品藏在他的皮箱内衬中。

sentences.en: Some drugs can irritate the lining of the stomach.
sentences.cn: 有些药物会刺激胃内壁。

sentences.en: The fall in inflation is the silver lining of the prolonged recession.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀率下降是长期经济衰退中的一线希望。
